INSERT INTO board ( category,companyName,periodStart, periodEnd,personnel,price,provideType,detail,checkInfo, boardFile, customerId)
VALUES (#{category},#{companyName},#{periodStart}, #{periodEnd}, #{personnel}, #{price}, #{provideType},#{detail}, #{checkInfo}, #{boardFile}, #{customerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE board INNER JOIN customer ON board.customerId = customer.customerId SET board.periodStart=#{periodStart}, board.periodEnd=#{periodEnd}, board.personnel=#{personnel}, board.detail=#{detail}, board.checkInfo=#{checkInfo}, board.price=#{price}, board.boardFile=#{boardFile}, board.category=#{category}, board.customerId=#{customerId} WHERE board.boardId = #{boardId}
